title: Mobile Learning Utilization Strategy Design for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Digital Device Proficiency and Experience in Mathematics Education
context.additional_context: Program focused on strengthening mobile learning tool competencies for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Developing mobile learning strategies utilizing the four core variables of the UTAUT model (performance expectancy, effort expectancy, social influence, facilitating conditions)
Analyzing the impact of Big Five personality traits (agreeableness, conscientiousness, etc.) on mobile learning acceptance and designing personalized educational frameworks
Developing mobile learning scenarios applicable to actual mathematics instruction through project-based learning

resources: Mobile Learning Platform (e.g., Khan Academy, Google Classroom)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
